nodes.text: Hawek Yellip was an employee of Czerka Corporation who worked in the Czerka Sentient Resources Department as a Sentient Resources Specialist during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Yellip composed a promotional report on several prominent staff members at CZ-198, Czerka's secure research and development facility: chief of security Zokar, the advanced security droid CZ-8X, and the facility's foreman Gragov.
